prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a spiky shell and a mysterious dark core.
I want a Pokemon that has a purple exterior and a fierce appearance.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a clam with sharp spikes and a hidden face.
Make a creature that is both defensive and aggressive, situated in aquatic environments.
Imagine a Pokemon with a unique shell design that can close tightly to protect itself.
Design a dual-type Pokemon with a blend of aquatic and defensive traits.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in the sea and has a strong, defensive nature.
